description:
Raymond is a Pokémon trainer who is garbed like a pirate during his journeys.
He challengess Ash to a Pokémon battle who defeats him. Raymond gets frustrated and sends all of his Pokémon out at once, However they all get defeated by Ash`s Pikachu in once Thunderbolt.
Maybe coincidently, the logo on his bandana is very simular to the Team Aqua logo.
name: Raymond
